😍 🕺 💃 🥳

Dear Beebs,

Even though there are days when you become a grumpy cat...☔

When I am around you I always feel the sun shining bright! 🌞

...

And then there are the times you have really crazy spontaneous moments when you become an exploding chicken...

But I have to admit, I love the way you move dance and sing to the music you hear in your head!

...

There are moments when sometimes I make you really mad inside...🤬

But always your deep care, love and compassion manages to prevail.

...
